annonstext:
Quickspin is one of the world’s leading providers of innovative and entertaining video slots. We have a long and successful history of creating award-winning games and doing so with awesome colleagues. We constantly strive to improve and are now looking for a senior Game Developer to join us, on site in Stockholm.

About the role

As a Game Developer at Quickspin, you are an important part of the creation of our awesome games. You will be working in a small agile team that is responsible for taking the game from a concept stage to a finished game, optimized for both desktop and mobile devices. Not only will you be the lead developer and write structured, testable quality code but also support the graphics and FX artists with implementing and coding art and graphical effects. We believe that working closely in small team is crucial in creating the best games and it helps us in an agile way to take faster and better decisions. We develop our games in TypeScript and they are rendered with the PIXI engine in WebGL and Canvas. We also work with ThreeJS for our 3D rendered games. To give the players the best experience, we put a lot of effort in optimizing our games for all platforms, both regarding file size and performance. We work in an ambitious, casual and fun atmosphere where we take a lot of pride in the games we create.

Qualifications and Experience

	4-5 years of prior experience of software development as employee or contractor
	Working experience in the iGaming / Slot Gaming industry
	Experience working with graphically performance-heavy web applications
	Working experience with JavaScript, ActionScript, TypeScript, HTML, or similar
	Interest in games, computer graphics programming, animations and effects
	Experience with client-server integrations
	The ability to deliver in an agile, iterative environment where pace is high and all voices matter

We also value

	Experience with hardware-accelerated 3D techniques
	Experience working with TDD and automated testing techniques
	Any other creative skill, from sound design to 3D modelling

 

Who are you and what do we offer

We are seeking a positive, creative, and self-motivated developer that wants to help us create the best damn gaming experience ever. You understand and embrace good development practices and you take pride in writing code that is easy to test, read and maintain. At Quickspin, Team comes first – and so you are also, of course, a team player. We go by the vision of “We create Awesomeness” and that goes with everything we do - From creating a great work environment together to making thrilling games. Life at Quickspin simply never gets boring – and it won’t take long until it really feels like home. You will be surrounded by kind, corny, and simply put - awesome people - that are truly passionate about what they do. We are also proud to say that we offer an excellent package, flexible hours and of course, a challenging and rewarding job in one of the fastest growing and most exciting industries there is.

 

Interested?
